response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's truly worth more than its face value. Considering its worth to you is $120, I propose a fair deal of $110 for this exclusive item. This offer allows us both to benefit - you receive a high-quality product at a reasonable price, while I ensure a fair return for my efforts and investment. Let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 110}
